item.title: "My heart goes out to you," Elon Musk said as he thanked Donald Trump supporters and made a one-armed gesture. Several users on X, the social medial platform he owns, have likened the gesture to a Nazi salute. Musk has not commented since the appearance.
item.description: "My heart goes out to you," Elon Musk said as he thanked Donald Trump supporters and made a one-armed gesture. Several users on X, the social medial platform he owns, have likened the gesture to a Nazi salute. Musk has not commented since the appearance.
